plug_name.message: Assistant for saving files from Coursera

plug_description.message: Assistant for saving media files from https://www.coursera.org, such as videos, subtitles, and video descriptions.

SAVINGFILES.message: Now storing files. Total number of files:

WRONGSITE.message: This is not the right site. I'm waiting for this one:

SPACESEPCHAR.message: Instead of spaces in file names
